casebody.data:
TINA M., et al., petitioners,
v.
SAINT TAMMANY PARISH SCHOOL BOARD. No. 15-1438. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 31, 2016.

Motion of Southern Poverty Law Center, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
